category.name: Data Sharing.STEP Translator
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: STEP_informative_doc_role
preference.preference_description: Supports only STEP AP214. Determines the document role of the dataset based on its defined relation type to the specified item revision. The default role is obligatory if the relation type is not listed under this preference. Valid Values: One or more strings; each string must be a valid informative relation type (for example, IMAN_reference).
